attributes.action: Make breast screening  available  to young women.
attributes.additional_details: To help stop the devastating  effects  from young women ,being diagnosed  with breast cancer ,unfortunately  before its found, the young women are already  beyond treatment, leaving young children  without a mum,which could have been prevented with early detection.
attributes.background: I would like a motion put  forward to make the age of breast cancer screening a lot lower ,it now is age 50,there are a lot of young women in 30s who are being diganosed, to late sometimes  for treatment .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Fund routine breast screening from age 30:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596526
